divs: Sighting DetailsI had fallen asleep one night in the summer and had at that time had a big interest in UFO's. As I slept, I suddenly felt awakened by some strange feeling and sound. It was early around 1:00 a.m. As I laid in my bed I felt a numb feeling as though I couldn't move. I thought I was having some kind of seizure but I wasn't. I struggled to move but couldn't. After a while I managed to get to my knees and look out the window. I saw a large object hoveing above the ground in the back yard(about 2 feet above the ground). I saw several lights blinking on and off around it's edge in the colours of purple, orange, white and yellow. The object was silver in colour with no obvious windows. I thought I was dreaming and laid back down. However, I woke again about an hour after the experience and felt as though my experience was real. I was afraid to look out the window. I knew that the experience had been real regardless of who believed me.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around August 31st 1986
Summary: A large object disk shaped with multiple coloured lights around it's perimiter
